original_text: He is to dip his finger into the blood and sprinkle some of it seven times before the Lord, in front of the curtain of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 그 제사장이 손가락에 그 피를 찍어 여호와 앞 곧 성소의 휘장 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: He is to dip his finger into the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 손가락을 피에 담그어야 한다

sentences.original_text: in front of the curtain of the sanctuary
